alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 6:25PM CDT until July 16 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Southern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Blue Hill, or 12 miles east of Fayette, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pleasant Hill around 640 PM CDT. Allen around 645 PM CDT. Caseyville around 650 PM CDT. Vaughn around 700 PM CDT. Loyd Star around 705 PM CDT. Brookhaven around 715 PM CDT. Wesson and Beauregard around 720 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
